title: A Saint Joined My Party
description: High-school student Suou Amadera has gone big brain and quit real life! Why waste time and money on real friends when you can browse the internet all day, every day? But suddenly, a mysterious girl appears, and with her saintly patience she shows Suou that maybe, friends in real life aren't so bad after all...

title: A Story About a Very Ordinary Couple
description: Continuation of A Story About a Man and a Woman and When They Sleep Together
